Package client

Class ClientView

java.lang.Object
client.ClientView
public class ClientView extends Object
The ClientView displays the information that the client gets from the server in the chat window.
Version:
1.0 3/2/2022
Author:
Mirco Ghadri, Ramza Josoph, Valeria Nafuna, Zakariya Omar, "Group 3"

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ClientView()
    Class constructor that provides the ClientView with a clientModel so that it can display data and fetch data from the clientModel.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientView

      public ClientView()
      Class constructor that provides the ClientView with a clientModel so that it can display data and fetch data from the clientModel. Makes the text area which displays all the messages uneditable. Sets lineWrap to true so that long messages will break on the chat window instead of creating a horizontal scroll policy.
